Control.Title: Circular Charts
Control.Description: Visualize the data using pie, doughnut and radial bar series.

Sample.Name: SemiPieChart
Sample.Title: Semi-pie chart
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to create a semi-pie using start and end angles.

Sample.Name: SemiDoughnutChart
Sample.Title: Semi-doughnut chart
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to create a semi-doughnut using start and end angles.

Sample.Name: DoughnutChartWithCurvedEdge
Sample.Title: Curved edge and spacing
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the use of CapStyle and GapRatio in a doughnut chart. CapStyle defines the rounded corners of segment edges, while GapRatio adds spacing between segments.

Sample.Name: Tooltip
Sample.Title: Tooltip
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the tooltip feature. On mobile, tap the data points, and on desktop, mouse over to the data points to raise the tooltip.

Sample.Name: Selection
Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Description: This sample depicts the selection feature in the chart. On mobile, tap the data points, and on desktop, click the data points to select or deselect them.
